General.Name: Odico A/S
General.Description: Odico A/S manufactures and sells formwork for the construction and wind turbine industries. It also provides consulting services, such as design guide and verification, parametric design and advanced modeling, project management, project engineering, prototyping, and testing services, as well as develops fabrication solutions. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Odense, Denmark.

2.Name: Mr. Asbjørn  Søndergaard
2.Title: CTO & Member of the Exec. Board
